mapper.select: select * from (select tmp2.*, m.image from (select rownum as r, tmp.* from (select blog.*,tmp.sdate, tmp.address from (select * from SUBSCRIBE where email=#{email})tmp left join blog on tmp.address=blog.url)tmp)tmp2 left join member m on m.email=tmp2.email) tmp3 where tmp3.r between #{first} and #{last} order by sdate desc
select count(*) as count from subscribe where email=#{email}
mapper.delete: delete from subscribe where email=#{email} and address=#{url}
mapper.select: SELECT b.email, b.title, b.INTRO, b.url FROM (SELECT EMAIL FROM subscribe where ADDRESS=#{url}) s join blog b on b.EMAIL=s.EMAIL
